would u like to do Shameless 2011 series ???

@the_shroud: Dark scenes from input haven't been altered, I never change brightness, saturation or contrast, maybe few times in the past I did, but not anymore. If people want sun-burned faces and "colorful" picture, so be it.
I am sensitive to aspect ratio however, and 98% of encodes of others have just that - especially in movies, where all Earth globes, moon and Universal logo of stars in the circle - appear as squashed. I always fix that.

Anyway, two things bare in mind: there is always price to pay or compromise must  be made. Second: x264 at extremely low bit-rates completely relies on psych-visual set of perception.

Btw, tag [experimental] mean "quality and procedure fluctuates", and you've experienced just that.

to aspect ratio =  to wrong aspect ratio
